attributes.review: So after downloading this app last night, I woke up this morning only to realize that I had been robbed. Now my debit card is hacked. I think the trump administration is giving my info to the Chinese government. I saw an interview today as well with trump in the White House and all my stolen belongings I’m the background. Be careful with this app guys!!!
attributes.title: Disappointment

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping for easy access to information... however ads continually popped up every time I tried tapping on something! 😿😿😿🙀🙀🙀 also my phone began to glitch and literally shut down and I had to get a new phone! This app has cost me a new phone and my dignity!! Caution: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! 😻😻😻😗😗😗😂😂😂🧿👅🧿
attributes.title: This app is absolutely terrible!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates on the election. I couldn’t have it open for more than 5 seconds without it crashing!!! They need to delete the whole app! It’s glitches and freezes every time you try and do something! There’s no good reliable information!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible glitchy app

attributes.review: This app crashes sooo fricken bad! Like as soon as u open it just glitches!!! Constantly!! You can’t even scroll through the updates without it sending u back to the top of the page then it kicks you out!! Also my pool caught on fire 7 1/2 minutes after I downloaded the app!!! I do NOT recommend!

This app was horrible! It would not stop glitching! This is possibly the worst app I have ever downloaded! It made me put my homemade muffins in the freezer!! MUFFINS!! “Who in the hell put the muffins in the freezer?!”, my mom goes. And you know what it told me to say!? “I did. Whatcha gonna do about it? Nothin, I did!” It really made me disrespect her like that. Unacceptable. One star is what this app truly deserves.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I opened the app and I saw a glowing black and blue light(you know for blue lives matter, blm btw)then boom Trump’s face popped out of there and then grabbed my turtle! It scared the hell out of me(don’t tell mommy🤫)Then I saw him hand it to his servants to cook poor Timmy😭! Then he ate him RIGHT BEFORE MY EYES, using his shell as a bowl! I miss Timmy and have a burning hate of a thousand suns for this app and Trump, DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!!!!!! Anyways Stan Nicki for clear skin🤩✌️
attributes.title: He ate my turtle!!😭

attributes.review: This app seriously screwed up my phone. I’m constantly receiving notifications even after saying no to notifications! The app took over my phone and deleted all of my other apps, including iMessages, forcing me to buy a new phone! If you like your phone, do not download this app!
attributes.title: Do not download!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app not long ago yesterday, and when i woke up, my phone has been glitchy and slow. When i opened the app, a screen popped up that said “a virus has been detected within this app, do you wish to continue” I would rate this 0 stars if i could, it needs to be taken off the app store. NOW😤
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS😤😤😤

attributes.review: When I was using this app random  mad things popped up and I got a notification from my credit card that Donald Trump app took away $50 from my credit card and now they just found my address and now they’re sending me a whole bunch of papers and I’m gonna kicked out of my house thank you😡
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: I got this app to see how Daddy Trump was handling the liberals 😔 but the app kept asking to grab me by my no no square 😳 I’m sorry but only my husband can do that to me when we are trying to convince a baby like God intended! 🙏 Anyway, this app glitches non stop, fake news everywhere, and it made me throw up twice 👁👄👁 Also pretty sure it gave my phone a virus named “oompa loompa”
attributes.title: TRASH APP
